introVC.convinient:
File your return from the
 comfort of your home
introVC.secure:
We exceed IRS security standards,
 so you can file with confidence
introVC.profession:
Your tax professional is available
 via phone, chat, and email
introVC.convinient.title: Convenient
introVC.secure.title: Secure
introVC.profession.title: Professional
welcome.title: Welcome to Connect
welcome.error.invalid.ero: Please insert a valid ERO code
welcome.invitation.key: Please enter your tax professional key
fileReturn.share.invitation: I'm getting my taxes done by %s, you should check out their app https://c.refun.do/%s
fileReturn.share.error.email: Your device isn't configured to send emails. Please check e-mail configuration and try again.
fileReturn.share.error.phone: ERO has not a valid phone number.
createAccount.signup.title: Create account
createAccount.signup.subtitle: Create account
createAccount.signup.body:
Please provide an email and password
 to secure your account.
createAccount.signup.error.confirmPasswo: Password and second password does not match
letsStarted.title: Welcome
letsStarted.subtitle:
Lets start with your
personal info
letsStarted.description:
We'll get some basic info about you
and the people in your life.
menu.chat.error: Please complete all your scenarios before chatting with your tax professional.
scanLicense.title:
Save time by scanning the
back of your Driver's License
scanLicense.description: Scan the barcode to quickly add your name, address, birthday, and driver’s license info needed to e-file your taxes.
login.title: Login to your account
login.subtitle:
So that you can carry over most of
your information!
login.warningMessage:
( If you have any changes, you will
still be able to edit all your information )
duplicatedAccountPopup.title:
We recognized your
previous Connect account
duplicatedAccountPopup.subtitle:
Do you want us to pre-fill
your previous information?
resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: In order to recover your password we need you to enter your email below
resetPassword.reset.email.instructions: Good!,Will be sent an email to your registered account
questions.title: Questions
summary.title: Personal Info
summary.subtitle: Personal info summary
summary.warning.info: Some of your info is missing. You can edit it now or just add it later, when you’re ready to file.
summary.question.name: Name
summary.question.warning.sent: If you want to make any changes, contact your tax professional through the chat
moreInfo.title: More Info
moreInfo.subtitle:
Alright, lets get some
info about your income
income.title: Wages & Income
income.subtitle: Upload your tax documents
income.warning:
Here are some examples of what you can 
upload. If you're not sure, click on Other.
attach.documents.title:
Let’s get information
about your
tax.breaks.title: Tax Breaks
tax.breaks.subtitle:
Lets dig into your tax
breaks and help you save money
tax.breaks.warning:
If they don’t apply, you can skip this section, 
and we can find out more later.
dashboard.tax.breaks.subtitle: Some of these scenarios can uncover big tax breaks.
pay.title: Pay
pay.withRefund.title: Use Bank Account
pay.withRefund.body: Let us help you pay your tax preparation fees with your refund!. The process is easy, fast, and best of all, convenient for all taxpayers.
pay.inPerson.title: In Person
pay.inPerson.body: If you wish to pay your tax preparation fees up front, please visit your tax professional's office.
disbur.title: Disbursement
disbur.accountDeposit.title: Account Deposit
disbur.accountDeposit.body: You can have your tax refund directly deposited into your bank account.
disbur.check.title: Use paper Check
disbur.check.body: We will mail a check of your tax refund to your home.
accountInfo.title: Account Info
accountInfo.view.title: Bank Information
accountInfo.view.subtitle:
I see you chose direct deposit. 
Please provide the following bank information.
attachId.selfie.title: Attach Selfie
attachId.selfie.subtitle: Please attach a selfie
attachId.selfie.name: %s's selfie
attachId.tpId.title: Attach ID's
attachId.tpId.subtitle:
Please attach pictures of the
front & back of the ID’s
attachId.tpId.name: %s's ID
attachId.ssn.name: %s's SSN
attachId.ssn.title: Attach SSN's
attachId.ssn.subtitle:
Please attach a picture of your
social security card
attachId.blurryMessage: Attached image is blurry. Please try again.
attachImages.title: Attachments
attachImages.subtitle:
Please attach any additional
documents below
attachImages.error.singleImageBlurry: Attached image is blurry. Please try again.
attachImages.error.multipleImageBlurry: The images were not uploaded because they were blurry.
attachImages.error.rejectedImages: %li of %li images could not be uploaded because they were blurry.
attachImages.error.pending.upload: Please wait while we upload your documents
secureMessage.title: Ready to File
secureMessage.view.title: Your Information is secure
secureMessage.view.subtitle:
We are now ready to send this
to your tax professional
congrats.title: Congratulations!
congrats.view.title: Congratulations!
congrats.view.subtitle:
Your information has been sent
 to your tax professional
keepFiling.title: Welcome back
keepFiling.subtitle: Let's continue where you left off
settings.title: Settings
chat.signature.invitation:
Click here to review and
 sign your return
finalReturn.title: Details
pdfViewer.signaturerequest.title: Signature Request
pdfViewer.finalreturn.title: Final Return
signature.title: Signature
signature.missing: Please it is necessary you perform a signature
signature.warning: Under penalties if perjury, I declare that I have examined this return and accompanying schedules and statements, and to the best of my knowledge and belieft, they are true, correct, and accurately list all amounts and sources of income I received during the tax year.
checkMark.subtitle:
Your signed documents
have been sent to your
tax professional.
confirmLogout.title: Are you sure you want to logout?
confirmLogout.subTitle: If you log out, you will have to start the return from the beginning
